    • addNewOrder

      public void addNewOrder​(java.lang.String product, int productModel, int productColor, int num, boolean willBeSupplied)
      Adds new order to previousOrders array
      Parameters:
      product - name of the product
      productModel - model number of the product
      productColor - color number of the product
      num - demanded amount of the product
      willBeSupplied - specifies if the requested amount is more than the stocks

    • addNewOrder

      Parameters:
      product - name of the product
      productModel - model number of the product
      productColor - color number of the product
      num - demanded amount of the product
      phoneNum - phone number of the customer
      address - address of the customer
      willBeSupplied - specifies if the requested amount is more than the stocks

    • searchProducts

      public void searchProducts​(java.lang.String productName, int productModel, int productColor, int mode)
      Searches chosen product across all branches or online stocks
      Parameters:
      productName - name of the product
      productModel - model number of the product
      productColor - color number of the product
      mode - determines if the search will be done across branches or online stocks
